FileFormat.FormatDescription: Shell Scrap Object Files are OLE documents created by dragging objects from an Office document to a file folder. Microsoft ended support for such files with Windows Vista. Microsoft Office 2007 or earlier is required to restore these items by dragging them back onto a document for viewing and conversion.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: This format can be identified via a container signature in DROID version 6 or later. The PRONOM database cannot currently represent container signatures.
